availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, carpenter. Virginia native. Married to Zerelda Gregory Dozier in Jefferson County on January 28, 1846. Father of Ann Dozier and James Dozier. Carpenter in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 1, p. 231.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 2, p. 125A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, 1842-1853, Film #000482707, p. 164 of 495 of microfilm (accessed on ancestry.com).
Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport â€“ Microfilm (before 1911), KDLA, Film 7007128: Louisville, Books 7-8 (1887-1894), p. 341, p. 344 of 789 of microfilm (accessed on ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "James C. Dozier (1813-1891)," Memorial 94885181, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/94885181/doz (accessed June 11, 2020).
